Aug 01, 2016 - link

Apple PowerMac 5xxx to 9xxx Memory Upgrades


Like some older Macs like the Performa , these are pretty old computers in 2016 and have long been discontinued. But, if you have one either for collecting or even as a daily driver adding more RAM is always a good idea.

These computers take either 30-pin or 72-pin SIMMS depending on specific model.

Aug 01, 2016 - link

Apple Performa and Older Memory


These Apple Performa models are pretty dated, with some going back 20 years or more. But, if you still have one that’s in use you can get a bit more life out of by adding some ram. For some of these models they are so old that it’s near impossible to find ram from traditional memory vendors and your best bet is to check eBay for ram.

eMac RAM


RAM Upgrades for Apple’s eMac lineup can be found here. The eMac line has long been discontinued but adding some memory to your 2002-2005 Apple eMac will help with getting a bit more life out of this older Apple desktop.

The Apple Mac Pro has long been the most powerful computer you can buy from Apple, but if you add more memory you can make it even more powerful. Here’s the ram you need for your Mac Pro
